1.content:

You went home every night exhausted, and for what? To listen to your annoying coworker while you have to serve the whims of other people? It sucked! If only you could change that somehow...

So you went to sleep that night, and unannounced to you, your pleas of desperation had been heard. Your 'boss', the powerful Master Hand, decided to bestow a special power onto you, and when you slept that night you dream of all the attractive women you worked with at your job, the one silver lining of it all.

113.content:
You were never one to enjoy waking up and today was no exception. A soft chiming alarm woke you up, making you groan loudly, shuffling around in your bed a little bit. As you lay there, you started to notice a few things. The bed was far too soft, the sheets way too expensive and pleasant to be yours and, probably the most president change; you didn't have an alarm clock. Slowly, you raise your head and nearly scream as your vision is totally black. Thinking you were blind, you grasp at your face before your fear transforms into confusion. You weren’t blind but somehow your face was covered in thick locks of hair. Shifting it out of the way, you are hit by yet another shock.

Your room has changed. The floor is a rich, dark oak and is covered in parts by beautiful carpets made of what looks like extremely expensive material. The bed you're lying on is the same, made of silver with the most beautiful and magically soft, cyan blue, silk bed sheets covering your body. Looking up, you see a gorgeous mural of the night sky, making you think, for the briefest moment, that the room had no ceiling. Yet the greatest shock came when your eyes looked straight ahead at a massive mirror. On the bed you’d seen, covered in the cyan blue silk sheets that were draped over your body, was the most beautiful woman you’d ever laid eyes upon.

She was blonde, her hair dropping over one eye in an alluring and mysterious manner. Her other eye wasn’t covered, letting you see the wonderful, crystalline sapphire colour in all of its magnificent glory. Her lips were plump and kissable, her cheeks softer and smoother than any you’d ever seen before. She could’ve easily been an angel, fallen from heaven. Yet something was off yet again. Usually if you’d seen a woman that hot, in bed, covered in little more than some think bits of silk, you’d be hard as a rock. But there was nothing. Not a single peep from down under.
Then it hit you. That woman, lying on the bed with the seductive look in her eye, with the sheets barely covering her no-doubt perfect body and the ever so slightly messy hair dropping down perfectly over one eye, giving off the impression she’d had fun the night before… She was you.

info.brief_description: You're a clean up guy in the 'world' of Smash, when one day you get a mysterious power...
info.description:
In the crossover world of Super Smash Bros., you're just a member of the cleanup crew. Picking up the pieces after a fight and making sure the fighters are well taken care of. It's a lousy job, but somebody's gotta do it. You'd give anything to escape this hell of a job and see how the fighters themselves live...

And thanks to the intervention by the lord of the realm, Master Hand, you're given the power to enter the bodies of the female fighters and inhabit them for as long as you like! What you do after that is up to you, do you return to their world and live their lives for them, or do you do something much more... perverted?

Characters:

Ian - You (aka 'Insert A Name'). Just a guy who's trying to get by in this shitty job.

Rick - Your coworker, a bit of a prick, but there's not many other people to talk to.


The basic rules of this story are as follows;

1. No killing off the Main Character
2. No possessing males.
3. Anything goes sex wise
4. Everyone in this story is at least 18.

Don't be afraid to add new chapters!
